goodreadr.name: GoodreadR
goodreadr.desc1: GoodReadR is an app for online bookstore owners. It adds a Goodreads review widget on your Shopify store

sme.name: SME
sme.desc1: SME is an accounting, inventory, procurement, and payroll system specifically tailored for Philippine small and medium-scale businesses.

doorbell.name: Doorbell Beta
doorbell.desc1: Doorbell is an app built for real estate agents and investors. Doorbell allows you to be notified via SMS or email if there is a foreclosed property in the market that suits your needs.
